short_description: Easily receive SMS activation codes for various online services. Simply request a code for services like Google, Instagram, and Facebook, and get your verification SMS quickly and efficiently.
help_cmd_text:
This bot allows you to easily send SMS activation codes to verify accounts for popular online services.

 📋 Available Commands:

unknown_cmd_text:
Unsupported Command

Sorry, the command you entered is not recognized. Please make sure to use one of the supported commands. Type /help to see the list of available commands and how to use them.
